column2: The Provincial High Court revised the said order of ejectment on the
basis  that  the  Respondent  has  clearly  established  the  fact  that he  was  in

column1: possession of the disputed land over 50 years and as  per the judgment of

column2: (1982)  2  Sri  L.R.  621in  such  a  situation  a

column1: competent authority  should  not  repossess  a  land  placing  reliance  on  the

column2: provisions of the State Lands  (Recovery of Possession)  Act.  In addition, it

column1: had relied on the unreported judgment of SC Appeal No. 138/96.
